name: Two Minutes to Disaster
description:
Controls:

On the Press any button screen, please use your preferred method of control. Regardless of your selection, keyboard inputs will still work.

Z is shoot.

Holding X enters focus mode which just makes you move slower for finer movement.

Arrow keys are movement

R is fast room reset (keyboard only)

Controllers should theoretically work, with 360 controllers having A to shoot and B to Focus.

Both the D-pad and stick should work

Autofire is an option; This game is very mash heavy otherwise so please do be careful to not injure yourself.

Possible Photosensitive warning, due to large quantities of flashing bullets at one point in the game.

The goal is to defeat the boss before two minutes is over and to score as many points as possible.

Score Hints:

The sooner enemies die, the more points they're worth.

If you kill an entire batch of enemies quick enough they will drop medals.

The more medals you get without failing, the more points you get.

Having less damage and more time remaining will also contribute to score at the end of the game.

Credits:

Made for Gunner Parade '22 Game Jam
